project_description: The SMC Hub is the online shopping platform operated by San Miguel Corporation, offering a diverse range of its most trusted food, beverage, and essential consumer brands. I contributed to its backend development, focusing primarily on the Admin/CMS aspects and data management.
techs: Laravel, PHP, Jquery, Javascript, Angular, API SMS

project_description: The card offers financial flexibility and convenient access to cash based on the promotions/plans associated with the card. Customers enter a reference number, receive an OTP, and then select payment plans to avail cash. I contributed to both the backend and frontend development, focusing on data submission and adhering to the design templates provided by the designer.

Suzuki prioritizes customer safety above all else. Service campaigns are implemented to ensure that your Suzuki vehicle meets the highest quality and safety standards. I contributed to the backend development and also assisted with frontend development when the frontend team was overloaded.
techs: Laravel, PHP, React, Jenkins, Jira, API SMS, Putty, Git

project_description: I am the main developer for Ajinomoto Thailand's Ecommerce platform, responsible for both the frontend and backend of the admin side. Our platform leverages Shopify for the customer interface and utilizes Laravel/PHP as middleware to export order data into CSV/XLSX files for integration with SAP and the LINE plugin.
techs: Laravel, PHP, React, jquery, Shopify Webhook Integration and API Utilization, LINE Plugin Integration, Jenkins, Putty, Git
